citations.narrative:
* USDA APHIS 7005 form ( Record of Cats on Hand ) has incomplete information on six cats housed at the premise. No
official identification was listed on these cats at the time of inspection. Complete and accurate records are needed to
ensure each animal’s identity can be known with certainty and to facilitate the ability to trace cats. The licensee must
maintain records which fully disclose the official USDA tag number or tattoo assigned to a cat. Correct by 1/5/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(vi) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
* USDA APHIS 7005 form ( Record of Cats on Hand ) has incomplete information on six cats housed at the premise. No 
official identification was listed on these cats at the time of inspection. Complete and accurate records are needed to 
ensure each animal’s identity can be known with certainty and to facilitate the ability to trace cats. The licensee must 
maintain records which fully disclose the official USDA tag number or tattoo assigned to a cat. Correct by 1/5/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
